markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rescuer's Press](/Feats.aspx?ID=2167) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 68</row>

**Archetype** [Lastwall Sentry](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=15)

**Prerequisites**
[Lastwall Sentry Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=882)

</column>

---

Any shield you wield gains the [shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193) trait. When you [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) using a shield and Stride as part of that action, you can move an additional 5 feet to either side of the creature you Shoved. In addition, if you are in the [Everstand Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=1087) and successfully Shove a creature using a shield that you wield two-handed, you can increase the distance of your Shove to 10 feet.

<title level="2">Knights in Training</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Legends](/Sources.aspx?ID=40) pg. 68</row>

The following feats represent benefits of training from the Iomedars (Kalabrynne for knight vigilant, Clarethe for knight reclaimant, either for Lastwall sentry).

**Related Feats**: [Shall Not Falter, Shall Not Rout](/Feats.aspx?ID=2168), [Vigil's Walls Rise Anew!](/Feats.aspx?ID=2169)
name: Rescuer's Press
